page.title: 08Hunting
page.content: The famous Blackmore Vale Hunt can often be seen during the hunting season and is well established in the area.With so many town dwellers coming to live in the area there is a split between hunt supporters and oposers,but the two sides agree to differ. Most farmers in the area are keen hunters and allow hunting on their land. Many local people are involved in shooting and there are some local shoots and shooting clubs. Fishing is also a very popular passtime with some excellent fishing places in the area.
